import React from 'react'; //import "../components/Template.css" import logo from '../components/images/logo-png.png'; import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css'; const Template = React.forwardRef(({ invoiceData }, ref) => { const styles = { container: { marginTop: '20px', background: '#eee', }, invoice: { background: '#fff', padding: '20px', }, invoiceCompany: { fontSize: '15px', textAlign: 'center', }, companyDetail: { fontSize: '10px', textAlign: 'center', wordWrap: 'break-word', whiteSpace: 'normal', }, invoiceHeader: { margin: '0 -45px', background: '#f0f3f4', padding: '8px', }, customerDetails: { fontSize: '10px', }, invoiceDate: { textAlign: 'right', paddingLeft: '20px', }, invoiceTo: { paddingRight: '10px', }, invoicePrice: { background: '#f0f3f4', display: 'table', width: '100%', }, invoicePriceLeft: { display: 'table-cell', padding: '20px', fontSize: '20px', fontWeight: '600', width: '75%', position: 'relative', verticalAlign: 'middle', }, subPrice: { display: 'table-cell', verticalAlign: 'middle', padding: '0 20px', }, smallText: { fontSize: '12px', fontWeight: '400', display: 'block', }, invoicePriceRow: { display: 'table', float: 'left', }, invoicePriceRight: { width: '25%', background: '#2d353c', color: '#fff', fontSize: '28px', textAlign: 'right', verticalAlign: 'bottom', fontWeight: '300', }, invoicePriceRightSmall: { display: 'block', opacity: '0.6', position: 'absolute', top: '10px', left: '10px', fontSize: '12px', }, invoiceFooter: { borderTop: '1px solid #ddd', paddingTop: '10px', fontSize: '10px', }, invoiceNote: { color: '#999', marginTop: '80px', fontSize: '85%', }, tableInvoice: { width: '100%', }, tableHeader: { backgroundColor: '#f0f3f4', fontWeight: 'bold', }, textCenter: { textAlign: 'center', }, textRight: { textAlign: 'right', }, textInverse: { color: '#2d353c', }, fW300: { fontWeight: '300', }, fW600: { fontWeight: '600', }, mT5: { marginTop: '5px', }, mB5: { marginBottom: '5px', }, mR10: { marginRight: '10px', }, };
{invoiceData[0].companyDetails.companyName}
{invoiceData[0].companyDetails.companyaddress},{invoiceData[0].companyDetails.companycity}, {invoiceData[0].companyDetails.companystate}, Phone No: {invoiceData[0].companyDetails.companyphoneNo}
to
{invoiceData[0].companyDetails.customerdetails[0].customername}
{invoiceData[0].companyDetails.customerdetails[0].custoomeraddress}
{invoiceData[0].companyDetails.customerdetails[0].customercity}, {invoiceData[0].companyDetails.customerdetails[0].customerstate}
Invoice No : {invoiceData[0].companyDetails.customerdetails[0].itemDetails[0].invoiceNo}
Date : {invoiceData[0].companyDetails.customerdetails[0].itemDetails[0].invocieDate}
TASK DESCRIPTION RATE HOURS LINE TOTAL

}); export default Template;
